Automata.NFADFA

Class CNFA

  • java.lang.Object
    • Automata.NFADFA.CFA
      • Automata.NFADFA.CNFA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INFA

    public class CNFA
extends CFA
implements INFA
    The CNFA class is an implementation of the abstract CFA class. It provides methods for building the NFA.
